cultures.title: Daivaradhane
cultures.descr: Daivaradhane is a sacred ritual of Tulunadu where divine spirits (Daivas) are invoked, worshipped, and embodied through possessed oracles, serving as intermediaries between gods and devotees.

cultures.title: Nagaradhane
cultures.descr: Nagaradhane is the sacred serpent worship of Tulunadu, where the Indian cobra (Nāga) is venerated as a divine protector, ensuring prosperity, fertility, and ancestral blessings.
